title: 1803 NavigationView built-in back button placement looks terrible.
body: For 1803, I like that the backbutton is now built-in to the NavigationView control.  However, the placement of the button looks terrible next to the hamburger button.

comments.body: Or maybe put the hamburger and menu on the right hand-side instead, with the navview header in the middle, and put the backbutton in the place where the hamburger button used be on the far left of page.

Personally, I would have preferred the backbutton to be right justified to the side of the navigation header line instead of in front of the hamburger button...  you could even add a forward button there as well...
maybe the backbutton placement makes sense in certain special cases... but its not something you can turn it on and forget about it...which is what most people want in a navigation control...
